reviews.name: Tila 87
reviews.text:
Dr. Parimalar is truly an exceptionally talented doctor. Her ability to diagnose and treat patients with such precision and care is remarkable. What truly sets her apart is how wonderful she is with children ‚Äî my own kids are living proof of that.

Recently, my daughter fell sick, and even after consulting elsewhere, her fever kept coming back. It was only after seeing Dr. Parimala that we finally got answers and effective treatment. With just a visit to her, my daughter ‚Äî who had been tired and uncomfortable ‚Äî was suddenly full of energy again. Her medicine works wonders.

What I appreciate most is not just her medical expertise, but the genuine care and attention she gives to each patient. She takes the time to explain, to reassure, and to treat not just the illness but also the parent‚Äôs worry. That kind of care is rare.

I travel all the way from Seremban just to consult with Dr. Parimalar ‚Äî and I will continue to do so. She is a blessing to any parent who wants their child in safe, capable hands.

I was impressed by the interior design, and the big smiling Mona Lisa portrait definitely made me chuckle a little üòÇ As for the service, it was honestly superb and the best! He also happily showed me my old filling when I had concerns about it and assured me that it was still in good condition. Honestly, if you‚Äôre around the area, do consider visiting here! If you‚Äôre reading this review, I believe the Hari Raya promo will be available only until 15/03/25.

I recently had the pleasure of visiting this dental clinic for a tooth extraction, and I couldn't be more impressed! From the moment I walked in, both the doctor and the staff were incredibly friendly and welcoming, making me feel at ease. What stood out the most was how detailed and thorough the doctor was in explaining the entire process to me before proceeding with the extraction. I felt completely informed and comfortable.

As for the extraction itself, it was surprisingly painless ‚Äì honestly, it felt more like the tooth was gently being moved rather than extracted. The doctor‚Äôs experience and skill were evident throughout the entire procedure.

The friendly staff also made the experience even better, always ready to assist and make sure I was well taken care of.

I highly recommend this clinic to anyone who needs dental work, whether it's an extraction or filling. You won‚Äôt regret it! Plus, parking is super convenient, and the location is easy to find. Another bonus is that they're open late until 10 PM, which is perfect for anyone with a busy schedule.
Price also very reasonable.

Overall, a fantastic experience. I'll definitely be coming back for any future dental needs!

reviews.text: Ni kali ke 2 jadi.. masing¬≤ kelam kabut nak balik rumah tak fikir patient. Kerja nak cepat¬≤ settle kerja cincai. First datang tampal gigi depan senget. Sama juga ganas juga.. ni second time ..Yang helper tak tahu lah baru firstime pegang suction ke apa tak tahu meleleh2 air ke bahu.. kau jolok suction kuat kedalam asal ? Geram tak dapat balik raya ? Kena kerja ? Bukan main sakit lagi dia tekan suction tu..Bila kerja tak ikhlas ni lah rupanya.. tengah ada patient time tu lah nak kemas¬≤ dah goyang2 aku kt kerusi tu. Low class punya clinic . Better pergi clinic chinesse lagi bagus.. orang nak support clinic melayu tapi cara layanan tu sampah. Bukan main ganas lagi baik doctor dengan helper dua kali lima. Dua kali datang sama je tak ada improvementüëéüëéüëé

reviews.name: Fauziah Pawan
reviews.text:
I walked into Kencana a reluctant patient because its the 25 day of Ramadan and I try to avoid any medical or dental procedures in these last 10 precious days...but Allah swt had other plans for me and i had to get a dentist take a look at my emergency issue.
From making the appointment just one hour before walking in to loving that they had essential oils being diffused in the waiting area to the friendly and informed reception..I was already at eased with the welcoming air.
The doctor was friendly and very thorough. First was a whole set of teeth review...recorded by the nurse. Then i am shown a screen pic of my issues which helped alot to give a "dentist view" of my teeth. Everything about the room was meant to put u at ease ( i dont know many people who like dentists so feeling at ease is a big thing). The doctor explained the procedure, gave me options, did a quick and neat work on my problem areas while responding to my need for quick breaks with much patience. She was good and I would go back for her to handle any future dental needs. Equipment and set up is very up to date.
I must mention again the ladies at reception that help create my good first impression ...hard to get that effect anywhere and even harder at a dental clinic ...but they do it quietly and effectively.
Price wise the clinic charges the normal market rate for different procedures but i have experienced less good service for higher charges so I would say the private clinic fees is not a dealing breaker considering the service I received.
The clinic even followed up the next day via Whatsapp to ask how I was and I see this as professionalism with a heart....its something thats missing in much of our health care business.
I still dont like any dental work but I would go back to Kencana if needed. In Syaa Allah

I had my first wisdom tooth extraction at this clinic with an Indian doctor, and it was a great experience. He was very professional, and I didn‚Äôt feel any pain during the procedure, even afterward. The healing process went smoothly and I was very satisfied with the results.

However, for my second extraction, Dr. Lyanna performed the surgery. Unfortunately, my experience was not as positive. She seemed a bit impatient and less professional during the procedure, and I even felt pain during the stitching. After the surgery, I experienced significant discomfort and pain.

On a positive note, the Malay female staff member was very kind and polite, and the Indian male doctor who treated me previously was excellent.

reviews.name: Karin Gan
reviews.text:
Oct 15, 2024. I came here to check and do cleaning. The only mode of payment is your physical local debit or credit card for you to tap. Bank App should allow you to save your debit/credit card to tap on any payment terminal. You have to check your bank's App to set up. They do not accept cash,TnG e-wallet or bank's QR scan. In other words, they do not have a QR code for you to scan. This is the only drawback.

Service is fast. Wait is short. I guess, I am lucky today. At the time of service, they do not accept appointment. Walk-in only. Must be at this place before 10am to be seen.

reviews.name: Michelle Koh
reviews.text:
Need to reached before 10am.
I reached 10.02am , ask why not reached early morning, should reached by 7.30am - 8am . They have right to not accepting after 10am.
Told need to wait for very long. Any different?
Kindly advice the cut off time instead of the operation hours. Thanks.
Registration counter male staff & checking pressure Officer not friendly.

reviews.name: Yuhainis Tahir
reviews.text: 3 july 2024. Pengalaman yg sy rasakan sgt berpuas hati dgn service dr kk gigi BK. Kaunter buka pukul 8am dan boleh dikatakan dr mula pendaftaran sehingga selesai cuma mengambil masa setengah jam sahaja. Dari kaunter pendaftaran sehinggalah doktornye teramat la cepat dan friendly. Masa buat scaling pon lancar. Jadi akan datang nak buat service lain pulak. Terima kasih semua.

reviews.name: Charan B
reviews.text: Our govt hospital and clinics are very good nowadays. No longer like how it was many years ago. Staff are courteous and friendly. I went to Klinik Pergigian Bukit Kuda in Klang yesterday as that was the only clinic with available appt slot in MySejahtera. Was informed by the staff that I can go to Seksyen 15 or Bandar Botanic next time as it's nearer to my home. No need for appointment. Just go between 8-10am. My whole dental check-up there took less than 2 hours. üëçüèΩ and I paid only RM1 for registration and RM2 for scaling work. Dr Parveen Kaur was very friendly and gave me great advice on where to get my implants done.

reviews.name: Andrew Lim
reviews.text:
I came here for a slanted wisdom tooth extraction, and wow ‚Äî what an unexpectedly smooth and fast experience! I‚Äôd been dealing with worsening pain for days, and last night, even painkillers didn‚Äôt help. In a rush, I surveyed nearby dental clinics for available slots and reasonable prices. I called this clinic early in the morning, and to my surprise, they had a dentist available ‚Äî I walked in and had the surgery done on the spot!

Everything was done in under 2 hours ‚Äî I‚Äôm now sitting in my car, still a bit in shock at how quickly and efficiently everything happened compared to my last wisdom tooth extraction!

Dr. Jay was incredibly kind and patient throughout the entire procedure. He constantly checked on me and made sure I was comfortable and calm, which really helped ease my anxiety.

The cost was super affordable, and the best part? The clinic accepts Health Metrics and many other panels ‚Äî I only had to pay a few hundred ringgit in the end after deducting balance from Health Metric

From the warm hospitality to the reasonable pricing and friendly service, this clinic truly exceeded my expectations üòÅ

PS: Currently talking with a slight lisp and half my face feels like it belongs to someone else ü§£

reviews.name: Erra Ma'amor
reviews.text:
Hi. I went for scalling here on 29th October 2023 but I've been waiting for time to actually post my review. I just moved to Klang in 2022 so I'm trying to find the best dentist so I could stick to one only. During the booking it was fine. All through whatsapp. And I booked the RM99 scalling.

Once I arrived I need to fill in my details and I could tell the customer service was so-so because the way the front desk (indian woman) look at me. But I'm cool with it. Since its not the worst one I've experienced. Waiting time was adequate too.

The doctor was very nice and kudos to her she gave a lot of good advices and treat me very kindly.

But once I went to make the payment again at the counter, I asked if I could pay with card. She said can. But the worst yet to come lol, I said I'm using my credit card... I still remember the way she looked at me (scorn much) "credit card? Are you sure this is credit card?"

I was stunt- do I look that MISKIN to have no cc? I wrote down there I'm a teacher. With the tone you trying to downgrade me like I'm lying ke I have a job? Sbb most of your customer college students eh? I still remember the look of her face macam hina betul saya ni.

Before I was a teacher, I was a customer service under LazadaMall... the way you sound was plain rude and not suitable to be FRONT OFFICE. I would advice the clinic to find someone else that have better attitude.

I'll still give you 4 stars because shes the only problem here. Harap maklum. Thanks!

p/s : I  baru tulis review sekarang sbb everytime I saw your ads (saw it recently) mesti I terngiang-ngiang muka that girl lol

reviews.text:
I‚Äôve always been afraid of visiting the dentist due to a terrible teeth cleaning experience many years ago, which gave me nightmares.

Every time I walked past Kea Smile Clinic, I was tempted to go in but still couldn‚Äôt overcome my fear. Finally, I decided to check out the reviews on Google, and I was so relieved to find many positive comments. A lot of people, just like me, mentioned how painless the experience was, and how friendly the doctor was. This gave me the courage to make an appointment.

And I‚Äôm so glad I did! The doctor was very kind and understanding. There was no judgment about the condition of my teeth. Today, I had painless scaling and filing, and it truly was painless. The pricing was also very reasonable. I highly recommend Kea Smile Clinic to anyone dealing with dental issues ‚Äì don‚Äôt let fear hold you back!

Thanks to Dr Darshyna & assistant.

reviews.text: I had a great experience at SH Khoo Dental Surgery! The staff were incredibly friendly and professional from the moment I walked in. Dr. Ashreenroop Kaur Gill was very gentle and explained everything clearly before starting the treatment. The clinic was clean, modern, and well-equipped, which made me feel comfortable and at ease. I really appreciated how they took the time to answer my questions and made sure I was comfortable throughout the process. Highly recommended for anyone looking for quality dental care!

reviews.name: Subashni M
reviews.text:
Finally made the effort to visit a dentist since it's been ages, so I didn‚Äôt have a regular one in mind. I turned to Google for help, and this dentistry popped up for all the right reasons.

Went in for a scaling and polishing session, took a deep breath, and placed my trust in Dr. Ashreenroop. And just like her name, she is truly beautiful, pleasant, friendly, and incredibly knowledgeable. She knew exactly what she was doing, explained everything clearly, and most importantly, made me feel so calm and comfortable throughout the process.

Honestly, I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôve ever met a dentist like her before. I only had scaling done today, and she recommended postponing polishing for now and returning in 3 months. Before that, she patiently explained the importance of using the right toothbrush and how essential mouthwash is. One thing‚Äôs for sure, I‚Äôll definitely be going back.

Thank you so much, dear Dr. Ashreenroop, for making the experience so gentle and reassuring.

reviews.name: Miss FAA
reviews.text:
Klinik ni sangat tak ok . I datang klinik ni sbb terdesak klinik yang selalu i pergi doctor xde . I g utk tampal sbb gg i dah xselesa sgt. Harga mahal tp service sgt teruk . Staff india sorang ni yang duduk kaunter tu biadap sgt . Dia plak yang nak marah2 i bila i tanya apa yang mahal sgt ni ? Cara dia explain dari awal dah kurang ajar. Menekan suara dgn i . Sbb masa i datang dia kata tampal gigi rm100-150 so okay la .. So bila smpai doc ada letak ubat sbb gigi i dah nampak akar katanya . So okayla i paham . Tp bila nak byr dia cakap memula 300 lebih . Lepastu i terkejut la . Apa yang 300 lebih ? Sbb tampal je kan ? So masa dia explain tu la dia nak marah2 i . Dahla explain xbtl . Dia cakap ada FOC apa benda tah , sekali i tanya la gg mana yang FOC utk ubat gg tu ? Dia kata gg sebelah , i cakap sebelah mana ? Sbb satu batang je i tampal , satu lg doc letak ubat gg apa tah , so yg mana foc ? Sbb dia cas je yg gg doc letak ubat gg tu . Katanya sebatang gg ubat gg tu rm40 , tp bg rm30 , so cas dua batang jadi rm60 . Satu lg FOC. I tanya la FOC mana satu ?
Pastu dia benggang dgn i . Baru nak g check kat dalam . Last2 keluar balik cakap dgn i satu je cas . So xjadi la bayaran 300 lebih . Jadi la rm280 total semua . Tampal sebatang gigi ya rm280 . Sekali ubat dia letak dalam gg i . Haa cmtu la lebih kurang . Letih la i nak type panjang2 . Cuma kalau korang nak g klinik ni , pk la dalam2 . Harga mmg harga kayangan dekat sini . Kalau kayangan servis ok xpe . Ni macam hareem ! Sekian ! Korang tgk resit i dekat bawah.  ü´†
